title: Goat's cheese and chive tart
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '200g (7 oz) plain flour', '100g (3 1/2 oz) chilled butter, cubed', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '25g (1 oz) Parmesan or Cheddar cheese, grated', '2 large eggs', 'For the filling', "110g (4 oz) creamy goat's cheese", '1 (200g) tub crème fraîche', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', 'ground nutmeg, to taste', "250g (9 oz) hard goat's cheese", '2 large eggs', 'pepper, to taste']
